sentences.english: Admittedly, translation machines and software bring much convenience for our study and our work.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，翻译机和软件为我们的学习和我们的工作方便。
诚然，知识强化责任意识。

sentences.english: Granted that a catalog is by its very nature a mélange.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，一份目录，就其本质来说便应当是混杂的。

sentences.english: Mr Peters has the right to raise questions about the Government's immigration policy.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，痞得屎有权对政府的移民政策提出异议。

sentences.english: To be sure, Europe has come far over the past 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，过去10年欧洲已经有了长足进步。

sentences.english: Since God created us, he ought to know how we are to be parented as well.
sentences.chinese: 既然神创造了我们，他诚然也知道怎样抚养我们。

sentences.english: Admittedly, all disciplines have a normative orientation.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，所有学科都有一种规范性导向。

sentences.english: admittedly, knowledge gained from books is also valuable and the more the better.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，来自书册上的常识也是名贵的，并且越多越好。

sentences.english: Of course, my approach to being a prof is probably not typical.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，我这名教授的工作模式或许不够代表性。

sentences.english: Certainly, the new great khan would have good cause to reassess Mongol strategy.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，新大可汗有足够的理由重新评估蒙古战略。

sentences.english: Yes, under the globalization context, boycotting is sort of a double-bladed sword.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，在全球化背景下，抵制是一把双仞剑。

sentences.english: So factor this into the timing of your bedtime routine.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，这是影响你日常的就寝时间的因素。

sentences.english: If that's true, openwashing might not have a long shelf-life as a marketing tactic.
sentences.chinese: 若诚然，开放炒作这一市场策略不会长寿。

sentences.english: Undoubtedly, moderate inflation can creep up to become high inflation.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，温和通胀会节节攀升，直至变为高通胀。

sentences.english: True, both sides pretend to agree that it's time for talks.
sentences.chinese: 诚然，双方假意赞成会谈。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
from this, it can be seen that...
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
